name: SHOTGUN (MeiZi)
description:
THE DEAL

There's a chip on your shoulder, a monkey on your back, and a debt hanging over your head.

Every move might be your last. So choose*. Wisely or otherwise.

But whatever you do, do not trust the voice in your head.

*or not. inaction is also an option, if that's what you're into. OF NOTE

This is intended to be a 「  tooth + nail  」supplemental thing. Eventually. Currently a very short, and tiny test to get acquainted with a new engine.

CREDITS

Videotome:ADV by Freya Campbell

 Music by Bio Unit
